samples.description: This demo includes a sample scene for hand tracking with VR Builder and the XR Interaction Toolkit. Importing this demo will install the following dependencies: • Package: OpenXR. • Package: XR Hands. • Package: Shader Graph. • Sample: XR Hands - HandVisualizer. • Sample: XRI - Starter Assets. • Sample: XRI - Hands Interaction Demo. It may take a bit of time, but at the end the sample scene will be opened automatically.

_upm.changelog: Please refer to the changelog URL
